library(leaflet)
df <- data.frame(lat=c(38.8913, 38.9066, 38.8924), lng=c(-77.0261, -77.0248, -77.0484), names=c("Smithsonian Natural History Museum", "Tiger Fork (Restaurant)", "Einstein Statue"))
#df %>%

my_map <- leaflet() %>%
     setView(lng = max(df$lng), lat = min(df$lat), zoom = 13) %>%
     addTiles() %>%
     addMarkers(lat= df$lat, lng=df$lng, popup=df$names)
     
my_map
